questions.question: How much does it cost to become an agency?
questions.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans starting from $29/month. Choose the plan that best fits your agency's needs.

questions.question: Can I change my subscription plan later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan at any time from your dashboard.

questions.question: How many agents can I have on my account?
questions.answer: The number of agents depends on your subscription plan. Basic plans allow up to 10 agents, while Enterprise plans have unlimited agents.

questions.question: Is there a free trial available?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all new agencies. No credit card required to start.

questions.question: What support is available?
questions.answer: We provide email support for all plans, with priority support and dedicated account managers for Professional and Enterprise plans.
